body:
Devang,  thank you very much for this but as i told you it's not a time issue  i have made the Booleans triggering the component depending in each other as you can see in the photos attached

now run energy component does not run unless the lighting schedules is embedded in the HBZones and the same for READ annual results component can not run unless the lighting analysis is finished  it does not work from the first time. i have to run each simulation twice
